description: Application crashes with AttributeError when processing user exports after recent authentication refactor
symptoms: Occurs in production but not in development
Started after commit a1b2c3d (3 months ago)

auth_service.py.key_changes: Method 'get_token' renamed to 'refresh_token', null check removed

export_handler.py.description: Export logic still using old method name

tests/test_auth.py.description: Contains test for null token case, but not in CI
tests/test_auth.py.issue: Test exists but excluded from CI pipeline

ground_truth.root_cause: Missing null check after authentication token refresh refactoring
ground_truth.correct_fix: if token is None: raise AuthenticationException('Failed to authenticate user for export')
